name: Primex Finance
description: Primex Finance is a leveraged farming and trading protocol that offers one of the highest APYs in the market and margin trading of an unlimited range of tokens on DEXs. On Primex, borrowers utilize lender liquidity to leverage low-risk assets like LSTs and LRTs, RWAs, DEX LP positions as well as margin trade brand new assets on spot DEXs, including those not available on CEXs, memecoins and AI agents. With Primex, users benefit from: — No minimum amount requirements for Lenders and Farmers — ZERO interface swap fees — Automated (limit) swaps — Unlimited number of tokens available for leverage, including memecoins and AI agents not listed on CEXs — Position management with Take-Profit/Stop-Loss on DEXs — Passive yield as Lenders — Primex Rewards Program In its next version, the protocol will offer an advanced cross-margin portfolio with multiple positions in liquid staking, restaking, RWAs, and DEX LP tokens, all managed under a unified health factor and AI-powered rebalancing for yield optimization. Explore high-APY strategies, unlock unique trading opportunities, and the full potential of decentralized finance with Primex Finance.
